description: Users may experience access denial when attempting to utilize the Windows Telephony Server services after applying recent updates. This symptom is particularly noted in Windows Server builds 6.1.7601.26864, 6.2.9200.24614, and 6.3.9600.21715 as part of the updates detailed in KB-5033379, KB-5033375, and related articles. The issue manifests when executing telephony-related tasks that rely on elevated privileges, leading to interruptions in service and potential downtimes for applications dependent on these functionalities.
